name: Dinner Is Served (GoatHG)
description:
Submission for "The Unexpected Jam"

Dinner is served! is a 2D adventure/horror game, where you take control of an undercover cop who's investigating a disappearance.

The player has the ability to interact with objects, and engage in a fight scene.

The Team behind "Dinner is served!":

Game Designer - Oscar Barroso

Discord: skarrx24#2015

Programmer - George C.

Discord: Gee#5496

Art and Sound Design - Peter Park

Discord: audiopalette#1267
